## Verification
- [ ] `npm run check`
- [ ] `npm run test`
- [ ] `npm run analyze:ci` + bundle report attached
- [ ] `npx playwright test --project=mobile-safari`
- [ ] Screenshots or metrics included for UI/perf changes

## Checklist
- [ ] Conventional commit(s)
- [ ] Tests added/updated when relevant
- [ ] Docs updated (README/CONTRIBUTING/etc.)
- [ ] No sensitive data committed
